mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(r.rating), 0), 1) AS avgRating, COUNT(*) AS reviewCount FROM review r JOIN accommodation a ON a.accommodations_id = r.accommodations_id WHERE a.user_id = #{hostId} AND r.is_deleted = 0
SELECT r.review_id FROM review r JOIN accommodation a ON a.accommodations_id = r.accommodations_id WHERE a.user_id = #{hostId} AND r.review_id = #{reviewId} AND r.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 1
